testcase.classname: To validate the account creation of the fb application
testcase.name: To create new account
testcase.system-out: When To launch url of fb application........................................passed And To click the create new account button..................................passed And To pass first name in first name text box...............................passed And To pass second name in second name text box.............................passed And To pass mobileno or email in email text box.............................passed And To create new password using new password text box......................passed And To select date from date field of DOB...................................passed And To select month from month field of DOB.................................passed And To select year from year field of DOB...................................passed And To click the radio button of gender field...............................passed And To click the signup button..............................................passed
